text: ONNO organic cotton t-shirt Couldn't load pickup availability ONNO’s organic cotton t-shirt is soft, thin and highly breathable. If you’re going somewhere warm, wear this shirt! Which t-shirt should I buy? We recommend trying all our fabrics. Seriously, it's the only way to know which one you'll like best : ) DETAILS - Organic Cotton is one of ONNO's lightweight t-shirts along with bamboo and lyocell bamboo. If you want a midweight fabric, try hemp or pima cotton. - <model-info-details> - Fit: tailored, flattering but not too tight. Based on reviews, these shirts run a dash small. If you’re between sizes, or like a looser fit, we recommend sizing up. - 100% organic cotton GOTS certified. - To prevent shrinkage, wash cold and tumble dry low. Washing hot and drying hot can cause your shirt to shrink up to half a size. - See our factory - Questions about fit, or anything else? E-mail – hello@onno.com MORE ONNO’s organic cotton is GOTS certified. We get audited yearly and the cotton in our t-shirts can be traced through each stage of the manufacturing process and back to the field where it was grown. Size Chart For chest and bust measurement, measure under your arms around the fullest part of your chest. If you are between sizes or prefer a looser fit, we recommend sizing up.
